ValidationRule.description: Enterprise main solution needs to be filled in after G2 when opportunity segment type is ENT
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( AND($Profile.Name != "Data Loader Profile", $Profile.Name != "System Administrator", $Profile.Name != "Excel Add-In Profile", $Profile.Name != "Nokia Admin Profile"), TEXT(Type) = 'ENT', NOT(ISBLANK(G2_Approval_Date__c )), ISBLANK(TEXT(Enterprise_Main_Solution__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Once G2 is passed, 'Enterprise Main Solution' field is mandatory if the opportunity belongs to Enterprise (i.e. 'Opportunity Segment Type' = 'ENT'). Please select a value.
